column3: ~Closing in favor of future / more targeted work~

Ran this through iwyu to confirm computationally that the relevant files were being locally referenced. See the output for master: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/Empact/889c787e1d9d45656d6cdfa2de6a917d/raw/fb1793cf4cd003d0ab0f196dd5c698451dc6290f/iwyu_master\nAnd this PR: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/Empact/889c787e1d9d45656d6cdfa2de6a917d/raw/fb1793cf4cd003d0ab0f196dd5c698451dc6290f/iw

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13177 (GCC-7 and glibc-2.27 back compat code by ken2812221)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Even given the iwyu logs, I'm doubting this is worth the review effort. Closing again!
